channel.title: Run&compile error!
channel.description:
when i run&compile my server i get this :-
[code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at server.main(server.java:33) Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "12 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1098) at NPCHandler.<clinit>(NPCHandler.java:42) ... 1 more[/code] this only happend since i added more stuff to the npc,autospawn and npcdrop files. i dont want to have to just throw away all my hard work so im going to attach these 3 files and i would like to know what errors you see in them? this will probably fix my problem once i fix these three files .
these would be .CFG but it doesnt let me attach those so i changed it to .txt so i can upload !
[b][u]PLEASE DONT JUST LEECH THIS CODE I HAVE WORKED HARD ON IT[/u][/b]
please post the errors you see!

item.title: Run&compile error!
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

revenge check ure pm’s !

Read full topic

item.title: Run&compile error!
item.dc:creator: @Revenge282 Revenge282
item.description:
@Revenge282 wrote:

Now just try to readd them. It should work.

PS- I have all the Canifis and Lumbridge NPC’s if you want to have them.

Read full topic

item.title: Run&compile error!
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

oh ty . that must be what is wrong because it does say “12” in the error !

im gonna try it

I think it’s something in your autospawn.cfg

spawn = 12 3078 3420 0 3081 3425 3075 3417 2 Barbarian spawn = 12 3079 3421 0 3082 3424 3076 3418 2 Barbarian spawn = 12 3077 3419 0 3080 3422 3074 3416 2 Barbarian

What you need to do is delete all of the spaces in between the “12” and the X coord and replace them with tabs. That that should work. If not, make sure all of the spaces between your numbers, are actually tabs. But, if I’m wrong, maybe someone with a little more experience than me could help you.

in mine they are all tab spaces !? what do i do?

i am deleting the barbarians and that seems to have worked !

Read full topic

item.title: Run&compile error!
item.dc:creator: @Revenge282 Revenge282
item.description:
@Revenge282 wrote:

I think it’s something in your autospawn.cfg

spawn = 12 3078 3420 0 3081 3425 3075 3417 2 Barbarian spawn = 12 3079 3421 0 3082 3424 3076 3418 2 Barbarian spawn = 12 3077 3419 0 3080 3422 3074 3416 2 Barbarian
What you need to do is delete all of the spaces in between the “12” and the X coord and replace them with tabs. That that should work. If not, make sure all of the spaces between your numbers, are actually tabs. But, if I’m wrong, maybe someone with a little more experience than me could help you.

Read full topic
